description: Returns the contents of a specified folder in a repository.

parameters.name: folderPath
parameters.description: The fully qualified path to the folder whose contents are returned, including the folder name. For example, /examples is a fully-qualified path to a folder named examples that was created off of the root directory (/) of a repository.

nested_items.name: commitId
nested_items.description: The full commit ID used as a reference for the returned version of the folder content.

nested_items.name: folderPath
nested_items.description: The fully qualified path of the folder whose contents are returned.

nested_items.name: treeId
nested_items.description: The full SHA-1 pointer of the tree information for the commit that contains the folder.

nested_items.name: subFolders
nested_items.description: The list of folders that exist under the specified folder, if any.

nested_items.name: treeId
nested_items.description: The full SHA-1 pointer of the tree information for the commit that contains the folder.

nested_items.name: absolutePath
nested_items.description: The fully qualified path of the folder in the repository.

nested_items.name: relativePath
nested_items.description: The relative path of the specified folder from the folder where the query originated.

nested_items.name: files
nested_items.description: The list of files in the specified folder, if any.

nested_items.name: blobId
nested_items.description: The blob ID that contains the file information.

nested_items.name: absolutePath
nested_items.description: The fully qualified path to the file in the repository.

nested_items.name: relativePath
nested_items.description: The relative path of the file from the folder where the query originated.

nested_items.name: fileMode
nested_items.description: The extrapolated file mode permissions for the file. Valid values include EXECUTABLE and NORMAL.

nested_items.name: symbolicLinks
nested_items.description: The list of symbolic links to other files and folders in the specified folder, if any.

nested_items.name: blobId
nested_items.description: The blob ID that contains the information about the symbolic link.

nested_items.name: absolutePath
nested_items.description: The fully qualified path to the folder that contains the symbolic link.

nested_items.name: relativePath
nested_items.description: The relative path of the symbolic link from the folder where the query originated.

nested_items.name: fileMode
nested_items.description: The file mode permissions of the blob that cotains information about the symbolic link.

nested_items.name: subModules
nested_items.description: The list of submodules in the specified folder, if any.

nested_items.name: commitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID that contains the reference to the submodule.

nested_items.name: absolutePath
nested_items.description: The fully qualified path to the folder that contains the reference to the submodule.

nested_items.name: relativePath
nested_items.description: The relative path of the submodule from the folder where the query originated.
